#summary References

You may want to consult the following references if you are interested in JNLua:
 
* [The Programming Language Lua|http://www.lua.org/] 
* [Lua 5.1 Reference Manual|http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/] 
* [Programming in Lua, Second Edition|http://www.lua.org/docs.html#books] 
* [JSR 223: Scripting for the Java Platform|http://www.jcp.org/en/jsr/detail?id=223]
 * [LuaBinaries project|http://luaforge.net/projects/luabinaries/]
